name: Aurora
description: Aurora Chain (AOA) holds the mission of creating bright an colorful blockchain world with fast-working contracts that facilitate easy development of applications on the blockchain. The team strives to allow businesses from disparate industries to cooperate using the distribution of a fixed supply of the underlying currency AOA as a means of ensuring the speed and functionality of the consensus mechanism. As such, transactions may be realized quickly from delegated proof of stake voting equipped with byzantine fault tolerance to improve interactive consistency within the system.
